newsitem.title: USA: Texas Commerce Bank Q3 net rises.
newsitem.headline: Texas Commerce Bank Q3 net rises.

text.p: Texas Commerce Bank, a unit of Chase Manhattan Corp, said on Tuesday that its third quarter 1996 earnings rose to $72 million, up $21 million from one year ago.
Total revenues increased to $315 million, up 12 percent from the same time in 1995, the company said.
For the first nine months of the this year, Texas Commerce's earnings totalled $202 million, up $47 million from the first nine months of 1995.
The firm's loans totaled $12.2 billion in the third quarter, up 11 percent from last year, they said.
